attributes.action: confirm, ratify the UN Convention banning cluster bombs that continue to kill and maim many thousands of children and other civilians, during and long after conflicts have ended.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over 100 countries have now signed the UN Convention banning cluster bombs, but the ban will not come into force until at least 30 countries have confirmed the agreement to ban cluster bombs. A third of all casualties are children. The significant majority of those killed or injured are children or other civilians.
